title: Get TTO video linking requests as a creator

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. Use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ endpoint to get or renew an access token.

parameters.name: creator_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique ID of the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ or /tt_user/oauth2/refresh_token/ to this field.

parameters.name: tto_invite_link
parameters.description: The invite link associated with a TTO Creator Marketplace campaign that the creator (TikTok account) has been invited to. To create a TTO Creator Marketplace campaign as a brand and obtain the associated invite link, use /tto/tcm/campaign/create/ .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: campaign_id
fields.description: The ID of the TTO Creator Marketplace campaign.

fields.name: spark_authorization_days
fields.description: The default Spark Ads authorization days for videos uploaded to the campaign. Enum values: 0, 7, 30, 60, 180, 365.

fields.name: link_requests
fields.description: A list of linking requests that the creator has received.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: The ID of the creator video that has been requested to be linked to the campaign.

fields.name: link_request_id
fields.description: The ID of the linking request. You can pass the ID to /tto/creator/link/request/confirm/ to approve or reject the linking request.
